peril.views.slick.states

Class PlayerSelection.Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.states.PlayerSelection.Player
  • Enclosing class:
    PlayerSelection

    private final class PlayerSelection.Player
extends Clickable
    Encapsulates the details about a player that is displayed on the PlayerSelection screen. This also stores the core details about the player so that a SlickPlayer can be constructed when the game is loaded.
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Clickable, SlickPlayer
